name: Last Christmas (itch)
description:
You are one of the Santa's elfs. 

You've woken up one day and reallised that everyone is gone. You decided to go to Santa but it turned out that he has been locked in his house by masked attacker. He sends you on quest to save christmas as it is in great danger!

Will you collect all gifts before it's too late?

Controls: 

WSAD or arrow keys to move,

F to pick up gifts,

Esc to pause game. 

Mouse to look around,

My game was made in 4 days (really 3 as I just added sound last day so that doesn't count) and it is really short. I hope to expand on this idea some time in the future.
